Full stack Website

I am a highly experienced Ruby on Rails full stack web developer with over 2 years of experience in building state-of-the-art web applications. I specialize in customizing web development projects to meet specific business requirements and am well-versed in a wide range of technologies and tools. My skill set includes expertise in Git and version control systems, frontend technologies such as HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap5, JavaScript, jQuery, STIMULUS, and TURBO, and backend technologies such as Ruby and Ruby on Rails. I am also experienced in working with SQLite and PostgreSQL databases, database design and modeling, UML Diagrams, testing with rspecs, and deployment on platforms such as AWS and Heroku. Additionally, I am familiar with tools such as Redis, Redis Enterprise, Postman, and API integrations, and am able to develop RESTful APIs and integrate with Google APIs. If you have any ideas or thoughts for a web application, I would love to discuss them with you and help bring them to reality. Let's work together to make your dream app a reality.

Data mining and scraping

I am a skilled full stack web developer and data scraper with over 2 years of professional experience. Proficient in Python and Ruby on Rails, I have a proven track record of successfully scraping and mining data from a wide range of websites, including simple HTML pages and complex JavaScript pages. I have experience scraping mobile data from sites such as Gazelle Mobile and WhatMobile, as well as equity data from Financial Times. My quick turnaround time allows me to efficiently extract data from any website or platform in just a few hours.

GIT Fundamentals Certificate

Awarded this certificate GIT Fundamentals by 10Pearls University. I have completed the GIT Fundamentals course offered by 10Pearls University. This course provided a comprehensive introduction to the world of version control and how to use GIT to manage and collaborate on software development projects. Throughout the course, I learned the basics of GIT and how to use it to manage and track changes to my code. I also learned how to use GIT to collaborate with other developers and merge changes from multiple branches. This certificate of completion showcases my ability to use GIT effectively and efficiently and it will help me to advance my career in software development. I am grateful for this opportunity to learn from 10Pearls University, one of the top institutions in the field of software development.

Triplebyte Engineering Certificate

Awarded this certificate Timed Coding - Expanded Library by Triplebyte. Triplebyte is a technology recruiting company that offers a coding challenge and an interview process to evaluate a candidate's skills as a software engineer. The Triplebyte Timed Coding Library Engineering certificate is likely a certification that is awarded to candidates who have successfully completed Triplebyte's coding challenge and interview process for a specific area of expertise, such as library engineering. This certification can demonstrate to potential employers that the candidate has a strong understanding of library engineering and has been vetted by Triplebyte's team of experienced engineers.
